message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. I believe this is a fair price, considering its value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is too low. I'm willing to come down to $11,000, which still leaves room for you to make a profit. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $10,500. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
